thread.title: Some Dude Proposed To His Girlfriend At A FROZEN SOUL Show In Sweden
thread.title_full: Some Dude Proposed To His Girlfriend At A FROZEN SOUL Show In Sweden

author: Greg Kennelty
title: Some Dude Proposed To His Girlfriend At A FROZEN SOUL Show In Sweden
text:
[Frozen Soul](/tag/frozen-soul)'s recent show at the Kollektivet Livet Bar & Scen in Stockholm took a turn for the romantic. [Frozen Soul](/tag/frozen-soul) fan Jesper proposed to his longtime girlfriend Marie on stage, and she said yes! Though I guess [Frozen Soul](/tag/frozen-soul) wouldn't have posted the video if she said no – that would be kind of a dick move and really ruin the vibe.
"Congratulations to Jesper and Marie on their engagement, Jesper had the guts to get on stage at [Kollektivet Livet Bar & Scen] during our set in front of a packed crowd to propose to his love Marie and she said yes!!" said
[Frozen Soul](/tag/frozen-soul) on their Instagram. "Truly beautiful, it made our first time in Sweden even more amazing we can’t wait to get back!"
[Frozen Soul](/tag/frozen-soul) also has a bunch of dates lined up for North America this April with [Amon Amarth](/tag/amon-amarth), [Cannibal Corpse](/tag/cannibal-corpse), and [Obituary](/tag/obituary) – just in case you're looking for proposal ideas. Check 'em out below and get your tickets right here.
